name: Surface (Liam Brady)
description:
You've been tasked with exploring an exoplanet. However, the atmosphere of the planet is mostly argon, so your oxygen-filled cabin is not dense enough to actually descend to the surface...unless you can find a way to make your cabin heavier.

Controls:

  • Mouse or WASD - move
  • Space bar or click - shoot
  • P - pause the game
  • Shoot the meteoroids to make them small enough to take on board
  • The more meteoroids you shoot, the heavier your spacecraft will be and the deeper into the planet you can go
